senses.sense_definition: Someone who often uses proverbs in speech or writing.

examples.text: My grandfather was a dedicated <w>proverbialist</w> who had a wise saying for every possible situation.
As a <w>proverbialist</w>, she annoyed her friends by constantly quoting old folk wisdom instead of giving direct advice.

senses.sense_definition: Someone who composes, collects, or studies proverbs.

examples.text: The famous <w>proverbialist</w> published a comprehensive collection of sayings from the eighteenth century.
He worked as a <w>proverbialist</w> at the university, researching the origins of common idioms.
